mapper.select: select s.university_number as student_number, s.name as student_name, major.category_name as major_name, grade.category_name as grade_name, p.Professor_name as professor_name, sex.category_name as sex_name from student as s join major_information as major on s.major_number = major.code join student_grade as grade on grade.code = s.grade join student_sex as sex on sex.code = s.sex join professor as p on p.Professor_number = s.Professor_number where s.professor_number = #{professer} and s.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by s.university_number
